9177e5ac94f038749e8d4eb526a65461e0f6df4c: Judge finds Heather Mills assertions of wealth exaggerated and dismisses her depiction like Paul McCartney business partner McCartney was generous giving Mills substantial capital and gifts but did not give her valuable paintings McCartney fortune estimated at million not the million claimed by Mills her expectation to exist like McCartney deemed unrealistic Mills claim of zero earning capacity dismissed judge believes her career was advanced not hindered by McCartney
